text: Kang the Conqueror (Nathaniel Richards) is a supervillain appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics, most commonly serving as one of the main antagonists of the Avengers franchise and a major antagonist in the Fantastic Four franchise. == Fictional character biography == He is a time-traveling terrorist and conqueror who is intent on total domination of the entire universe. Since his debut, he has served as one of the Avengers' most recurring and dangerous foes. == Powers and abilities == He can travel through time, control the flow of time, and even create alternate timelines and realities. Despite all this, Kang does not actually have any super powers per say. He is a normal power level humanoid, although with futuristic technology, he is able to shield and power up himself. == In other media == Kang the Conqueror has been described as one of Marvel's most notable and powerful villains. Kang has made media appearances in animated television and video games. Multiple versions of the character, portrayed by Jonathan Majors, appeared in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) in the Disney+ series Loki and the 2023 movie Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Kang the Conqueror
